sentences.en: Engineering and technology are disciplines distinct from one another and from science.
sentences.cn: 工程学和工艺学互不相同，也有别于自然学科。

sentences.en: He carved out a name for himself in the engineering business.
sentences.cn: 在土木工程业方面,他孜孜以求为自己赢得了声誉.

sentences.en: His team solved the engineering problem by stealing an idea from nature.
sentences.cn: 他的团队从自然界获得灵感，解决了这个工程难题。

sentences.en: I saw an advert for a job with a large engineering company.
sentences.cn: 我看见一家大型工程公司的招聘广告。

sentences.en: She works for an engineering firm.
sentences.cn: 她在一家工程公司工作。

sentences.en: The ABC of engineering is very difficult.
The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.
sentences.cn: 这座桥是现代工程的一大成就。

sentences.en: The Channel Tunnel project is the biggest civil engineering project in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英吉利海峡隧道是欧洲最大的土木工程。

sentences.en: The coach was a masterpiece of Teutonic engineering.
sentences.cn: 这种长途汽车是体现德国工程设计水平的杰作。

sentences.en: The most acquisitive firms tend to be engineering groups.
sentences.cn: 最贪得无厌的公司往往是工程队。

sentences.en: The robot is a marvel of modern engineering.
sentences.cn: 机器人是现代工程技术的奇迹.

sentences.en: The tunnel is a brilliant feat of engineering.
sentences.cn: 这条隧道是工程方面的光辉业绩。

sentences.en: Their inventions have contributed to the development of electrical engineering.
sentences.cn: 他们的发明有助于电气工程学的发展.

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

sentences.en: We subcontracted the work to a small engineering firm.
sentences.cn: 我们把工作转包给了一家小型工程公司。

sentences.en: You could study astronomy , or space engineering , and be good at it.
sentences.cn: 你可以学习天文学，或是空间工程学，可以学的很棒。

words.tran_cn: 引擎，发动机；机车，火车头；工具

phrases.tran_cn: 环境工程；环境工程学；环境保护工程

trans.tran_en: the work involved in designing and building roads, bridges, machines etc
